articles.author: Lauren Forristal
articles.title: Here are Apple’s top AI announcements from WWDC 2025 - TechCrunch
articles.description: At WWDC 2025, Apple announced several AI features, such as a workout coach, live translation, and more.
articles.content: Last year, Apple’s WWDC keynote highlighted the companys ambitious strides in AI. This year, the company toned down its emphasis on Apple Intelligence and concentrated on updates to its operating sys… [+4652 chars]
